name: 郭政淳
objective:
本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to write varying types of English paragraphs, for instance, paragraphs of definition and paragraphs focusing on cause and effect relationships. In addition, they will have plenty of opportunities to write various kinds of short English essays, including descriptions, narratives, and argumentative writings.
schedule:
Week 1 Introduction 
Week 2 Paragraph Structure 
Week 3 Unity and Coherence 
Week 4 From Paragraph to Essay
Week 5 Academic Writing Resources
Week 6 Process Essays (I)
Week 7 Process Essays (II)
Week 8 Academic Writing: Tests and Practices 
Week 9 Cause/Effect Essays (I) 
Week 10 Cause/Effect Essays (II)
Week 11 Writing Academic Papers
Week 12 Comparison/Contrast Essays (I)
Week 13 Comparison/Contrast Essays (II) 
Week 14 Computer-Assisted English Writing
Week 15 Argumentative Essays (I)
Week 16 Argumentative Essays (II)
Week 17 Holiday: No Class
Week 18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Quizzes: 20%
Essays: 20%
Class Activities: 20%
Group Survey: 15%
Final Exam: 25%
materials: Oshima, Alice, Ann Hogue, and Lara Ravitch. 2014. Longman Academic Writing Series, Level 4: Essays (5th ed.). Pearson Education.
